text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --
AUSTRALIA, May 19 - COAL -
QUEENSLAND - Abbot Point - one vessel loading, 1 waiting, 4 vessels due by 17/6, no delays.
Dalrymple Bay - maintenance shutdown scheduled for 1900 hrs. 3/6 to 2100 hrs. 6/6. One vessel loading, 6 waiting, 9 vessels due by 27/5, approx. 4-5 days delay.
Hay Point - two vessels loading, 3 waiting, 5 vessels due by 2/6, approx. 1-2 days delay.
Gladstone - union members of Curragh coal mine commenced a two week stoppage from 1500 hrs. 8/5 over enterprise bargaining agreement.
R.G. Tanna - 2 vessels loading, 2 waiting, 23 vessels due by 26/6, approx. 1-2 days delay.
Barney Point - 1 vessel loading, 3 due by 4/6, no delays.
Brisbane - berth vacant, 2 vessels due by 15/6, no delays.
NEW SOUTH WALES - Newcastle - Kooragang - 2 vessels loading, 12 waiting, 21 vessels due by 7/6, approx. 10-12 days delay.
Channel (Dyke) - 2 vessels loading, 17 waiting, 18 vessels due by 5/6, approx. 8-10 days delay.
Port Kembla - one vessel loading, 2 waiting, 20 vessels due by 6/8, approx. 1-2 days delay.
IRON ORE -

WESTERN AUSTRALIA - Port Hedland - due to shortage of Mt. Newman lump and iron ore and Yandi fines, vessels may experience some delays to berthing/loading or be forced to berth out of turn. Due to heavy rain, vessels may be further delayed as cargo shortage situation may become more critical. Berth A - 1 vessel loading, 5 anchored, Berth B - 1 vessel in port, 3 anchored, 1 due 22/5, 4 other vessels anchored, 8 due by 27/5, 11 other vessels due with no ETA.
Dampier - Parker Point - 5 vessels anchored.
E.I. Island - 1 vessel loading, 6 anchored.
Dampier lineup - 18 vessels due by 18/6. E.I. Island will be closed due to berth maintenance from 1100 hrs. 27/5 to 1100 hours. 28/5.
Port Walcott -one vessel loading, 11 vessels due by 3/6.
May 21 - GRAIN -
QUEENSLAND - Mackay, Gladstone - no vessels due.
Brisbane - one vessel loading wheat, 3 wheat vessels due by 27/5.
NEW SOUTH WALES - Newcastle - two vessels loading, 7 wheat vessels due by 29/5. Terminal will be closed from 2359 hrs. 23/5 to 0800 hrs. 26/5 for maintenance.
Port Kembla - four wheat vessels in port, 6 wheat vessels due by 8/6, berthing programme based on grade of cargo receivals by rail.
VICTORIA - Geelong - one vessel loading malt, 1 wheat vessel in port, 5 vessels due by 5/6.
Portland - one vessel loading peas, 1 wheat vessel in port, 7 vessels due by 5/6.
SOUTH AUSTRALIA - Port Pirie - one vessel loading barley.
Port Adelaide, Thevenard, Ardrossan - no vessels due.
Port Lincoln - one wheat vessel due 27/5.
Wallaroo - two vessels due.
Port Giles - one barley vessel due 23/5.
WESTERN AUSTRALIA - Geldton - one vessel loading lupins, 2 wheat vessels in port.
Kwinana - one vessel loading lupins, 1 barley vessel in port, 4 vessels due by 30/5.
Albany - two vessels due by 29/5.
Esperance - one wheat vessel due 27/5.
